name: Watchman On The Wall
description:
The goal of the game is to hold off the invading computer viruses

till air support arrives.

Game duration 2 to 3 minutes.

This was made for Weekly Game Jam #190  theme walk on walls.

Made with Godot Game engine

Loosely fits the theme. ( you walk on the firewall. )

This is our first game jam and first finished project.

It is kind of rough  ;)
